verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H935>"Go<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H7971>"Let<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> Me.

"But <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to <S%H7971>let<s%> [them] <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5062>smite<s%> your <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1366>territory<s%> with <S%H6854>frogs.<s%>

"And the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> will <S%H8317>swarm<s%> with <S%H6854>frogs,<s%> which will <S%H5927>come<s%> up and <S%H935>go<s%> into your <S%H1004>house<s%> and into your <S%H2315>bedroom<s%> <S%H4904><s%> and on your <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and into the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of your <S%H5650>servants<s%> and on your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and into your <S%H8574>ovens<s%> and into your <S%H4863>kneading<s%> <S%H4863>bowls.<s%>
"So the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> will <S%H5927>come<s%> up on you and your <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5650>servants.<s%>"' "

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>"Say<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5186>'Stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> with your <S%H4294>staff<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers,<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H2975>streams<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H98>pools,<s%> and make <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> up on the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>'"

So <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H3651>same<s%> with their <S%H3909>secret<s%> <S%H3909>arts,<s%> making <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> up on the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6279>"Entreat<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that He <S%H5493>remove<s%> the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> from me and from my <S%H5971>people;<s%> and I will <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> "The <S%H6286>honor<s%> is yours to tell me: <S%H4970>when<s%> shall I <S%H6279>entreat<s%> for you and your <S%H5650>servants<s%> and your <S%H5971>people,<s%> that the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> be <S%H3772>destroyed<s%> from you and your <S%H1004>houses,<s%> [that] they may be <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> in the <S%H2975>Nile<s%>?"

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4279>"Tomorrow.<s%>" So he <S%H559>said,<s%> "[May it be] according to your <S%H1697>word,<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> like the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

"And the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> will <S%H5493>depart<s%> from you and your <S%H1004>houses<s%> and your <S%H5650>servants<s%> and your <S%H5971>people;<s%> they will be <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> in the <S%H2975>Nile.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H1697><s%> the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H7760>inflicted<s%> upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and the <S%H6854>frogs<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> out of the <S%H1004>houses,<s%> the <S%H2691>courts,<s%> and the <S%H7704>fields.<s%>
So they <S%H6651>piled<s%> them in <S%H9148>heaps,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H887>became<s%> <S%H887>foul.<s%>

But when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was <S%H7309>relief,<s%> he <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> and did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to them, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>"Say<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H5186>'Stretch<s%> out your <S%H4294>staff<s%> and <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that it may <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H3654>gnats<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>'"

And they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> with his <S%H4294>staff,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and there were <S%H3654>gnats<s%> on <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H3654>gnats<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H6213>tried<s%> with their <S%H3909>secret<s%> <S%H3909>arts<s%> to <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H3654>gnats,<s%> but they <S%H3201>could<s%> not; so there were <S%H3654>gnats<s%> on <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast.<s%>

Then the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H1931>"This<s%> is the <S%H676>finger<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>" But Pharaoh's <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H2388>hardened,<s%> and he did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to them, as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>said.<s%>

Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7925>"Rise<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H3320>present<s%> <S%H3320>yourself<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> as he <S%H3318>comes<s%> out to the <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H7971>"Let<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> Me.

"For <S%H518>if<s%> you will not <S%H7971>let<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of insects on you and on your <S%H5650>servants<s%> and on your <S%H5971>people<s%> and into your <S%H1004>houses;<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of insects, and <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> they [dwell.]

"But on that <S%H3117>day<s%> I will <S%H6395>set<s%> <S%H6395>apart<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H5975>living,<s%> so that <S%H1115>no<s%> <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of insects will be <S%H8033>there,<s%> in <S%H4616>order<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> am in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

"And I will <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H6304>division<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> and your <S%H5971>people.<s%> <S%H4279>Tomorrow<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H226>sign<s%> shall <S%H1961>occur.<s%>"' "

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%> And there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3515>great<s%> <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of insects into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H7843>laid<s%> <S%H7843>waste<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of insects in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to your <S%H430>God<s%> within the <S%H776>land.<s%>"

But <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is not <S%H3559>right<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> for we shall <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> what is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%> <S%H2005>If<s%> we <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> what is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> will they not then <S%H5619>stone<s%> us?

"We must <S%H1980>go<s%> a <S%H7969>three<s%> days' <S%H1870>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> as He <S%H559>commands<s%> us."

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H7971>let<s%> you <S%H7971>go,<s%> that you may <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> you shall not <S%H1980>go<s%> very <S%H7368>far<s%> away. <S%H6279>Make<s%> <S%H6279>supplication<s%> for me."

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am <S%H3318>going<s%> out from you, and I shall <S%H6279>make<s%> <S%H6279>supplication<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that the <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of insects may <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> from his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and from his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow;<s%> <S%H7534>only<s%> do not let <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8524>deal<s%> <S%H8524>deceitfully<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> in not <S%H7971>letting<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and <S%H6279>made<s%> <S%H6279>supplication<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1697>asked,<s%> and <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H6157>swarms<s%> of insects from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> from his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and from his <S%H5971>people;<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7604>remained.<s%>
But <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6471>time<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> and he did not <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>
